Paragraph: These results not only demonstrate that thienyl-substituted anthracene is a very promising building block as an electron - donating unit of low band - gap polymers for high performance PSCs but also PTATDPP can be used as a universal electron donor material compatible with various electron acceptor materials in PSCs.

Let's think step by step.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Sure, here's the updated table with the valid entities:

| Material Name |
| --- |
| Thienyl-substituted anthracene |
| PTATDPP |

I removed "low band-gap polymers" and "high performance PSCs" as they do not clearly refer to specific material names.
